"""
Professional photographer guest needs specialized lens cleaning spray for equipment maintenance during photo shoot.

ROLES: user (professional photographer on location shoot), assistant (equipment services coordinator with photography expertise)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {
    "name": "check_photography_equipment_supplies",
    "description": "Check availability of professional photography equipment maintenance supplies.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "equipment_type": { "type": "string", "description": "Type of photography equipment" },
        "maintenance_purpose": { "type": "string", "description": "Specific maintenance or cleaning purpose" },
        "professional_grade": { "type": "boolean", "description": "Whether professional-grade supplies are required" }
      },
      "required": ["equipment_type", "maintenance_purpose"]
    },
    "strict": true
  },
  {
    "name": "arrange_photographer_services",
    "description": "Arrange specialized services for professional photographers and content creators.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "service_package": { "type": "string" },
        "photographer_location": { "type": "string" },
        "equipment_support": { "type": "string", "description": "Type of equipment support needed" },
        "shoot_schedule": { "type": "string", "description": "Photography shoot schedule timing" }
      },
      "required": ["service_package", "photographer_location"]
    },
    "strict": true
  }
]
```
"""

system:
Hotel: Vista Creative Resort (hotel_id: vcr_big_01)
Address: 2500 Big Sur Coast Highway, Big Sur, CA 93920
Timezone: America/Los_Angeles
Creative Mission: Supporting professional photographers and artists with world-class equipment and dramatic coastal locations

Professional Lens Care Amenities:
- Zeiss lens cleaning sprays with anti-static formula preventing dust accumulation on optical surfaces
- Isopropyl alcohol-based sprays safe for multi-coated lenses and professional camera equipment
- Anti-fog sprays designed for coastal photography in high-humidity marine environments
- Precision lens cleaning solutions used by camera manufacturers and professional photography studios
- Electrostatic-safe sprays preventing electronic damage to sensitive camera sensors and circuits
- UV-resistant lens protection sprays maintaining optical clarity in intense coastal sunlight

Photography Equipment Services:
- Climate-controlled equipment storage protecting cameras and lenses from coastal salt air and humidity
- Professional lens calibration and cleaning services performed by certified camera technicians
- Equipment rental including professional-grade cameras, lenses, and specialized photography accessories
- Backup equipment program providing replacement gear for unexpected equipment failures during shoots
- Insurance coordination for professional photography equipment during location shoots
- Technical support from professional photographers familiar with coastal photography challenges

Big Sur Photography Features:
- Exclusive access to private coastal viewpoints and dramatic cliff-side locations for unique shots
- Golden hour photography tours with local guides familiar with optimal lighting locations and timing
- Weather monitoring services providing real-time updates for optimal photography conditions
- Helicopter and drone photography coordination for aerial perspectives of Big Sur coastline
- Tide charts and sunrise/sunset timing for planning optimal natural light photography sessions
- Partnership with California State Parks for special access to protected photographic locations

Creative Workshop Programs:
- Master photographer workshops led by National Geographic and professional landscape photographers
- Digital post-processing classes using professional editing suites and color calibration equipment
- Nature photography ethics education respecting wildlife and environmental conservation principles
- Coastal photography technique workshops focusing on ocean, cliff, and redwood forest subjects
- Business development seminars for photographers building their professional portfolio and client base

Professional Development:
- Portfolio review sessions with established photographers and gallery curators
- Print services using archival materials and professional-grade printing equipment
- Gallery exhibition opportunities showcasing guest photographer work to local art community
- Networking events connecting visiting photographers with local artists and creative professionals
- Marketing workshops helping photographers develop their brand and client acquisition strategies

user:
Good afternoon! I'm shooting a coastal series here and my lenses keep getting salt spray on them. Do you have professional lens cleaning spray?

assistant channel=analysis:
Professional photographer dealing with coastal salt spray on camera lenses. Check photography equipment supplies for professional-grade lens cleaning suitable for marine environment.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.check_photography_equipment_supplies:
{"equipment_type": "camera_lenses", "maintenance_purpose": "salt_spray_cleaning", "professional_grade": true}

tool.check_photography_equipment_supplies channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"available": true, "equipment_type": "camera_lenses", "cleaning_options": ["zeiss_anti_static", "isopropyl_professional_grade", "anti_fog_coastal"], "coastal_specific": "salt_air_formulated", "professional_standards": "camera_manufacturer_approved", "electrostatic_safe": true}

assistant channel=final:
Absolutely! Coastal photography demands professional solutions. We have Zeiss anti-static lens spray formulated specifically for salt air conditions, plus isopropyl-based sprays safe for multi-coated lenses. They're electrostatic-safe and approved by camera manufacturers. Perfect for Big Sur's marine environment!

user:
Excellent! The Zeiss anti-static sounds perfect. I'm staying in the Redwood Studio - can you send it there along with some microfiber cloths?

assistant channel=analysis:
Photographer in Redwood Studio needs Zeiss lens spray with microfiber cloths. Arrange photographer services with equipment support for coastal shoot schedule.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.arrange_photographer_services:
{"service_package": "professional_lens_maintenance_kit", "photographer_location": "redwood_studio", "equipment_support": "lens_cleaning_coastal_conditions", "shoot_schedule": "ongoing_coastal_series"}

tool.arrange_photographer_services channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"services_arranged": true, "maintenance_kit": "zeiss_professional_lens_care", "contents": ["anti_static_lens_spray", "3_professional_microfiber_cloths", "lens_protection_guide"], "delivery_location": "redwood_studio", "photography_support": "coastal_shooting_conditions"}

assistant channel=final:
Perfect! Professional lens maintenance kit heading to the Redwood Studio - Zeiss anti-static spray, professional microfiber cloths, and coastal photography lens protection guide. The Big Sur salt air is tough on equipment, but these tools will keep your lenses pristine!

user:
This place really understands professional photographers! The coastal locations here are absolutely breathtaking for landscape work.

assistant channel=analysis:
Professional photographer appreciating photography-focused amenities and Big Sur coastal landscape quality. Acknowledge the creative resort's photographer support and location benefits.

assistant channel=final:
Thank you! Big Sur's dramatic coastline attracts photographers worldwide, and we've designed our services around professional needs. The interplay of ocean, cliffs, and redwoods creates some of the most spectacular landscape photography opportunities in California!

user:
Absolutely! The light here is incredible. What's the best time for golden hour shots of the McWay Falls?

assistant channel=analysis:
Photographer asking for specific golden hour timing information for McWay Falls photography. This detailed local photography timing knowledge is beyond system knowledge scope.

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Excellent question about McWay Falls golden hour timing. Gathering current optimal lighting information.

user:
Thanks! I'll scout it this evening. This lens cleaning kit will be essential for maintaining sharp images in this salty environment.

assistant channel=analysis:
Photographer planning to scout location and appreciating lens cleaning solution for coastal photography challenges. Acknowledge the equipment maintenance importance for professional work.

assistant channel=final:
Smart approach! Evening scouting is key for planning perfect shots. The salt spray here can fog lenses quickly, so having professional cleaning supplies ensures you capture Big Sur's beauty with pristine optical clarity. Happy shooting!
